text: Fluminense Football Club () or Fluminense, is a football club in the city of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, based in the neighbourhood of Laranjeiras since its foundation, in 1902, making it the oldest football club of Rio de Janeiro. ==Current Squad== == Notable Players == * Ademir Menezes * Assis * Branco * Carlos Alberto Torres * Castilho * Conca * Delei * Denílson * Didi * Edinho * Félix * Flávio * Gérson * Henry Welfare * Lula * Manfrini * Marco Antônio * Marcos Carneiro de Mendonça * Orlando * Oswaldo Gomes * Paulo César Caju * Pintinho * Preguinho * Renato Gaúcho * Ricardo Gomes * Rivelino * Romerito * Romeu * Samarone * Telê * Thiago Silva * Tim * Valdo * Washington == Trophies == ===International=== * Copa Rio Internacional: 1 ** 1952 * Olympic Cup: 1 ** 1949 ===National=== * Série A: 4 ** 1970, 1984, 2010,2012 * Brazil Cup: 1 ** 2007 * Campeonato Brasileiro Série C: 1 ** 1999 ===Regional=== * Torneio Rio- São Paulo: 2 ** 1957, 1960 * Taça Ioduran: 1 ** 1919 * Zona Sul da Taça Brasil: 1 ** 1960 ===State=== * Campeonato Carioca: 31 ** 1906/1907/1908/1909, 1911, 1917/1918/1919, 1924, 1936/1937/1938, 1940/1941, 1946, 1951, 1959, 1964, 1969, 1971, 1973, 1975/1976, 1980, 1983/1984/1985, 1995, 2002, 2005, 2012 * Taça Guanabara: 8 ** 1966, 1969, 1971, 1975, 1983, 1985, 1991, 1993, 2012 * Taça Rio: 2 ** 1990, 2005 * Torneio Início: 9 ** 1916, 1924, 1925, 1940/1941, 1943, 1954, 1956, 1965 == Other websites == * Official Website * Best Attendances * Ranking Carioca League * Matches 1902/2005 * Canal Fluminense - Fluminense´s Daily News * Torcida Tricolor ==References== Category:Football clubs in Rio de Janeiro Category:1902 establishments in South America Category:1900s establishments in Brazil
title: Fluminense FC
